quote: Thursday afternoon, the dark clouds closed in, and by Friday morning a heavy rain was falling. The mountain peaks were hazy sentinels, disappearing into misty fog that clung to the valley.
quote_letters: THURSDAY AFTERNOON THE DARK CLOUDS CLOSED IN AND BY FRIDAY MORNING A HEAVY RAIN WAS FALLING THE MOUNTAIN PEAKS WERE HAZY SENTINELS DISAPPEARING INTO MISTY FOG THAT CLUNG TO THE VALLEY
